stages.logText: Nafi's lover and elder son are missing somewhere in the woods. She wants me to find them.
Manay refused to help with finding Nafi's lover
Nafi's younger son told me that there's a she-bear in the area. Apparently, they hunted her cubs, and he thinks she wanted revenge.
I have found Istif. He was injured and I healed him. All that is left is finding his father
Nafi's lover has been killed by the bear
I have told Nafi that I killed the she-bear
I informed Nafi of what transpired. She is thankful, but sad.
Mostef is confident that outsiders poisoned his village.
Jasem believes that Kent's Hollow is suffering from a disease. He thinks that they've been cursed by Gunret.
Gunret said that the village is sick because they eat bad food.
Gunret denies Jasem's allegations and insists that the village is sick because they eat bad food.
There was a rabid pup just outside of Kent's Hollow. It seemed to be infected by some disease. When it bit me, I felt weaker and  more aggressive.
Manay did not believe me.
Jasem did not believe me, he still thinks Gunret caused the illness.
Ka recovered thanks to the root juice. Mostef is very thankful.
Mostef wonders what started the infection in the first place. Could it be the wolves' new source of food?
There are large logs blocking the path further into the woods.
I have asked Jasem to clear the logs.
Deep in the forest, where the trees have withered, I found a wolf in a terrible state. How is it even alive?
There is a pond of chemical sludge deep in the forest. It seems that the wolves have been feeding on it.
6- I've told Jasem about the pool of sludge. He is worried, but refuses to stop eating wolf meat.
